name: Dice Maze
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move the die to the exit. You must reach the exit with the matching face of the die on top.

Use key tiles to unlock doors, but they can only be activated with the matching die face on top.

Timer keys can work with any die face, but only keep the doors open for a set number of turns.

Use ESC to leave a level and R to restart the level.

Concept, Code, Art and some SFX by me, Penguinmanereikel.

Level Design by a kind, helpful, random stranger on the GMTK Discord, Punocchio.

Music is "Canon in D for Two Harps" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
